awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 wins & 14 nominations.

fullplot: Drama and reality combine in a fictitious 24 hours in the life of musician and international cultural icon Nick Cave. With startlingly frank insights and an intimate portrayal of the artistic process, the film examines what makes us who we are, and celebrates the transformative power of the creative spirit.
plot: Writer and musician Nick Cave marks his 20,000th day on the planet Earth.
title: 20,000 Days on Earth

tomatoes.consensus: Revealing yet respectful, 20,000 Days on Earth is essential viewing for any Nick Cave fan.
